mapper.select: SELECT custom, gf_url, IFNULL(live_stream_status,'') AS live_stream_status FROM kt_md_custom mc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT z.customer, SUM(z.cnt) AS live_stream_status FROM ( SELECT customer, CASE WHEN mon_status = 'OK' || mon_status = 'RECOVERY' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS cnt FROM strmondb.t_stream_mon WHERE telco_gubun = 'KT' AND deleted_yn='N' ) z GROUP BY z.customer ) stream ON mc.custom=stream.customer ORDER BY custom_level DESC, seq
